Text:

@VIRU5:
Run Setup.exe..it is clearly stated in the description...and also i trust this guy..just switch off your antivirus before installing and everything should be fine...and also PLEASE support the developers..IF YOU LIKE IT THEN BUY IT.. :)
it makes me open steam, so basically I can't play it without buying it.

to matteo1123
You can. Just off steam and run game.
it already comes with all expansions?

Gente eu fiz o download, instalei, mas na hora jogar(uso Garena) o jogo abre mas na hora de ir pro menu ele fecha e diz que n達o tenho permiss達o pra isso, pensei logo no steam e desliguei ele, ai deu erro no mesmo lugar e falou que n達o roda sem o steam.

to vrangel07
If you want support: RUS of ENG lang pls!

I recently installed this on my brand new laptop.  Everything went fine, until I tried to exit, and then it just froze and started taking up 0% cpu usage.  That night, my computer crashed with a very strange blue screen of death.  When I tried to reboot, the BIOS was gone.  Upon connecting the hard drive to a different computer, AVG internet security found a virus in Left_4_Dead_2.exe .  I'm gonna have to down rate this one, because it may have cost me a two week repair and lots of grief with tech support.

Same thing as Greylore. Whats up with that bruss?
W7x64. why the freez when trying to exit?

to Deog
To exit use in console: quit.
